title: Building the Perfect QB
itunes:title: Building the Perfect QB
description:
A room full of heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Conor Orr– break down the latest news from the NFL including Roger Goodell’s comments on the Raiders’ potential move to Las Vegas and the current situation in Buffalo. Plus, the heroes discuss NFL Media senior analyst Gil Brandt’s article “ The Perfect QB” and build their own perfect QB before wrapping the podcast with the first ever LIVE edition of “Orr you kidding me?!?”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
